Text:
Is this working on any PSP or not.
is this in english??

someone please comment quickly.....
because i am going to run it on my OFW 6.20 which will be hacked/released (6.20 TN-Hen created by total_n00b) on 24/12/2010 on few PSP hacking sites.

and i am not joking.
this is a bit late but its in deutsch, english, espanol, francais, italiano and portugues... also, none of the cutscenes will work on a sony memory stick... the crappy pieces of crap.
i hope this english and works on my PSP 3004 6.60 PRO B10

So, do i just put thin in my psp>games folder?
is it that simple
Finalflax you need to put it in the ISO folder (if you don't have one just create it on the root of the memory stick)...these games only work on custom firmware.
